other.line: I was planning on shaving this morning but no dice. My city (Fort McMurray) is on fire and everyone has been evacuated. I'm still stuck at work an hour north of the city. Sounds like today could be worse than yesterday. Luckily my girlfriend got out of town safely with the dogs and is in Edmonton now.

plain_colon_format.full_comment:
My sister is getting married today, so only one soap is good enough before my Tux goes on... LGC!
Hot shower
MF LGC (that's right, we're expropriating MF from Roam)
Thater 3 band badger
Standard razor...

Monday and Tuesday shaves. Paragon 2 band brush. The fine slant is great! Custom stainless steel handle on Tuesday
The deal Maker and Latha Limon are winners without question.

https://imgur.com/a/A90...

http://imgur.com/HmDXqgo

I'm learning to use a SR, so I made it through the first pass without too much trouble and then cleaned up with the toggle for pass two and three. Good shave. :)

Today's Shave
http://imgur.com/1A9DGrz
Still getting used to an SR, it's a bit awkward at times but it's coming around.
I forgot to add the balm, I went with AoS Ocean Kelp.
